title: 869 Hague Ave // 2nd Floor 2BR, Hardwood Floors // SEPT
neighborhood: Crocus Hill/Ramsey Hill/Summit University - Mitchell Hamline
posting_body: ['2-BR apartment --', 'Available September', '869 Hague Avenue, St Paul, MN 55104 -- 2nd floor', 'The apartment runs from front to back along the east side of the building', 'Rent: $1,140/mo', '3 people maximum as residents in unit ($50/mo extra rent if there are 3 people)', 'Four blocks north of Summit Ave (five blocks north of Grand Ave), 1/4-block west of Victoria St, you are close to the many shops and scenic areas St. Paul has to offer.', 'For law students, we are 3-blocks north of the William Mitchell College of Law.', ' #GreatForMitchellStudents #GreatForMitchellHamlineStudents', 'Our unit features:', '- Approx 725 sq ft.', '- 2-BR, LR, Large Kitchen, Dining area in kitchen, Bath', '- Electric stove', '- Hardwood Floors, No Carpet.', '- Owner pays for radiator heat, and water.', ' Tenant pays electricity.', '- Sorry, no pet dogs.', '- Ticket operated laundry in the basement', '- Off street parking lot (space is limited)', '- Strictly smoke-free!!!', ' All leases prohibit smoking, candles, and incense anywhere inside the building or on the property outside.', '- Flexible or Fixed lease terms available', '- Available for a September move in', 'Deposit:', 'Minimum of equal to 1 months rent.', ' Must have', 'excellent', 'credit history, sufficient income, and good references.', ' If criteria is not met, a higher deposit plus a co-signer/guarantor are potentially an option.', '** We are a family run business, not a big management company, who really cares for our buildings and the tenants so you will receive personal attention and care if you choose to rent from us.', ' Thanks!!', 'For more information, please contact the property managers directly and reference this CL ad:', 'Alisa or Brenna', 'Day:', 'show contact info', 'Evening:', 'show contact info', 'Email:  see craigslist "reply to" link at top of this ad', 'Website for more information:', 'http://www.apts.cc', 'This 2BR APARTMENT is for rent at 869 Hague Avenue, Saint Paul, MN 55104']
